title: Riot allowing paedophiles?
body:
Saw a player in oce today with the summoner name "sucktoddlerpenis"
How is this ok?

replies.body:
Just report the name and move on

your making a mountain out of a mole hill.
dont downplay pedofile names wtf is wrong with u

I saw a player with the name Chicken4dinner

it was me 

(aka, who gives a shit)

your making a mountain out of a mole hill

Best idiom OCE.
Do you actually care? And if so why? Do get in the shower after you sht because your buthole is too sensitive to handle the toilet paper?

It's not picked up automatically. At least, not that particular one.
Someone needs to report it or notice it before it gets removed :)
I have seen all kinds of names in LoL, if you find some that you just can not stand, report them simple.
it's a fucking name online. Is it really that important to you that someone has an idiotic name. At least he's being honest with himself unlike of the people that use the name of pro players.
so u agree with child molesting names?
